Yek hesab — hemû app

Create your account once. Learn Kurdish on Hinbûna, look up words on Ferheng, read stories on Çîrok, practice on Lîstik. Auto-login everywhere. Your progress and vocabulary follow you across all apps.

Hesabê xwe çêke

Ekosîstema Hinbûna Kurdî

More than a course — a complete world for Kurdish. A dictionary that knows your level. Stories crafted for your vocabulary. Games that target what you need to practice. An AI companion you can talk to in Kurdish. 10 tools, one account, one mission.

Hemû amûran bibîne
No credit card required Hemû planan bibîne →

Bi AI — ji bo te taybet

AI that learns how you learn. It spots your weak points and builds exercises around them. It adapts to your pace, your mistakes, your progress. Every lesson gets smarter the more you practice. No two learners get the same path.

Platform

Çima Hinbûna Kurdî?

Everything you need to learn Kurmanji Kurdish — structured, professional, and powered by modern technology.

Dersên Birêkûpêk

Professional A1-B1 Kurmanji lessons designed by Kurdish educators. Step-by-step progression from alphabet to conversation.

Hînbûna bi AI

AI evaluates your performance during lessons, identifies weak areas, and generates personalized practice sets adapted to your level.

Dengê Zimanî (AI TTS)

Every word and sentence with native Kurmanji pronunciation powered by AI text-to-speech. Listen, repeat, improve.

Pêşketina Te

Detailed analytics tracking your learning journey: completed lessons, vocabulary growth, accuracy trends, and daily consistency.

Planekê hilbijêre

Start free, upgrade when you're ready.
